info.title: Tribe Community API
info.description: Auto-generated API documentation for Tribe Community Platform. Includes billing, payments, subscriptions, and user management endpoints.

get.summary: Get Stripe configuration for mobile app
get.description: Retrieve Stripe publishable key and payment configuration for initializing Stripe SDK in mobile applications. This endpoint does not require authentication as it only returns public configuration.

publishable_key.description: Stripe publishable key for client-side SDK

get.description: Retrieve all invoices for the authenticated basecamp user. Returns invoices with status, amounts, and payment information.

403.description: Forbidden - User is not a basecamp user

message.example: Only basecamp users can access this endpoint.

get.description: Retrieve subscription details for the authenticated basecamp user including status, billing dates, and tier information.

monthly_price.description: Monthly subscription price in GBP (before VAT)

monthly_price_with_vat.description: Monthly subscription price including 20% VAT in GBP

403.description: Forbidden - User is not a basecamp user

message.example: Only basecamp users can access this endpoint.

post.summary: Create Stripe payment intent for basecamp invoice
post.description: Create a Stripe payment intent for a basecamp user's invoice. Returns client_secret for Stripe.js integration. Requires an unpaid invoice.

invoice_id.description: ID of the invoice to pay

client_secret.description: Stripe payment intent client secret for frontend integration

email.description: User email address for payment processing

400.description: Bad request - Invoice not found or already paid

message.example: Invoice not found or already paid.

403.description: Forbidden - User is not a basecamp user or invoice doesn't belong to user

message.example: You can only pay your own invoices.

post.description: Confirm and process payment for a basecamp invoice after successful Stripe payment. Updates invoice status, creates payment record, and activates subscription.

invoice_id.description: ID of the invoice being paid

message.example: Payment confirmed successfully. Your subscription is now active.

400.description: Bad request - Payment already processed or invalid payment intent

message.example: Payment already processed or invalid payment intent.

403.description: Forbidden

message.example: You can only confirm payments for your own invoices.

get.description: Retrieve detailed invoice information including invoice items, payment details, subscription information, and payment method details. Returns complete invoice data for viewing in mobile app.

403.description: Forbidden - User cannot access this invoice

message.example: You can only view your own invoices.

get.description: Download invoice as HTML file that can be printed as PDF. Returns invoice HTML content with proper headers for download. Mobile apps can save this HTML and convert to PDF or display in webview.

403.description: Forbidden - User cannot download this invoice

message.example: You can only download your own invoices.

post.description: Cancel the subscription for the authenticated basecamp user. By default, subscription will be cancelled at the end of the billing period (cancel_at_period_end=true). User can continue using the service until the end date. Works for mobile apps.

cancel_at_period_end.description: If true (default), cancels at end of billing period. Subscription remains active until end date. If false, cancels immediately and stops all future payments.

message.example: Your subscription has been cancelled successfully. Monthly payments have been stopped.

current_period_end.description: Subscription end date - user can still use service until this date

cancel_at_period_end.description: Whether subscription will cancel at period end

400.description: Bad request - No active subscription found

message.example: No active subscription found to cancel.

403.description: Forbidden - User is not a basecamp user

message.example: Only basecamp users can access this endpoint.

post.description: Submit a payment for an invoice. Directors can submit payments for invoices from their organisation.

invoice_id.description: ID of the invoice to pay

message.example: Payment submitted successfully. It will be reviewed by admin.

403.description: Forbidden - User does not have permission

get.description: Retrieve payment history for the authenticated user's organisation. Directors can view payments for their organisation.

403.description: Forbidden

get.description: Retrieve all reflections for the authenticated user. Returns reflections ordered by most recent first.

message.example: I need to improve my work-life balance

post.description: Create a new reflection for the authenticated user. Supports multiple image attachments (up to 10 images, max 5MB each). For mobile apps, send images as 'images[]' array in multipart/form-data.

message.example: I need to improve my work-life balance

image.description: Optional single image file (for backward compatibility, max 5MB)

images[].description: Optional multiple image files (up to 10 images, max 5MB each). Use this for mobile apps.

message.example: I need to improve my work-life balance

items.example: The images.0 may not be greater than 5120 kilobytes.

get.summary: Get chat messages for a reflection
get.description: Retrieve all chat messages for a specific reflection. Only the reflection owner can access the chat.

from.description: User ID who sent the message

message.example: How can I help you with this?

files.description: Array of all file URLs if message has attachments

isMe.description: Whether the message is from the authenticated user

post.summary: Send a chat message to a reflection
post.description: Send a chat message (text and/or file) to a specific reflection. Only the reflection owner can send messages.

message.description: Chat message text (required if files are not provided)
message.example: How can I help you with this?

file.description: Optional single file attachment (max 2MB, for backward compatibility)

files[].description: Optional multiple file attachments (up to 10 files, max 2MB each). Use this for mobile apps.

message.example: How can I help you with this?

items.example: The file may not be greater than 2048 kilobytes.

post.description: Update the status of a reflection. Users can only update their own reflections, unless they are super_admin.

403.description: Forbidden - User does not have permission to update this reflection

message.example: Forbidden: You do not have permission to update this reflection.
Something went wrong. Please try again later.

post.description: Authenticate user and return JWT token with user details

Register a new basecamp user account. Basecamp users are individual users who pay £10/month subscription. The user is automatically assigned the 'basecamp' role and receives a verification email. Returns JWT token for immediate authentication.

password.description: Password must contain uppercase, lowercase, number and special character, minimum 8 characters

details.example: The email has already been taken.

post.description: Processes a refund for a Stripe payment. Supports full or partial refunds. Requires director or super_admin role.

payment_id.description: ID of the payment record to refund

amount.description: Partial refund amount (optional, defaults to full refund)

description.example: Customer requested refund due to billing error

400.description: Bad request - Invalid refund request or payment already refunded

403.description: Forbidden

get.description: Retrieves refund history with optional filtering by organisation or subscription. Requires director or super_admin role.

403.description: Forbidden

post.description: Creates a Stripe Checkout session to renew an expired subscription. Works for both organisation users (directors) and basecamp users. The user will be redirected to Stripe Checkout to complete payment. After successful payment, subscription will be activated/renewed for another month. This endpoint works for mobile apps.

requestBody.description: No request body required. Subscription is identified from authenticated user.

redirect_url.description: Stripe Checkout URL to redirect user for payment

400.description: Bad request - Failed to create renewal checkout

error.example: Failed to create checkout session: Error message

403.description: Forbidden - User is not a director or basecamp user

error.example: Only directors and basecamp users can renew subscriptions.
Failed to create checkout session: Error message

post.description: Creates a Stripe Checkout session to renew an expired basecamp subscription. This is an alias endpoint for basecamp users. The user will be redirected to Stripe Checkout to complete payment (£12.00 including VAT). After successful payment, subscription will be activated/renewed for another month. This endpoint works for mobile apps.

requestBody.description: No request body required. Subscription is identified from authenticated user.

redirect_url.description: Stripe Checkout URL to redirect user for payment

400.description: Bad request - Failed to create renewal checkout

error.example: Failed to create checkout session: Error message

403.description: Forbidden - User is not a basecamp user

error.example: Only directors and basecamp users can renew subscriptions.
Failed to create checkout session: Error message

post.description: Reactivates a cancelled subscription without requiring payment. This only works if the subscription was cancelled but the end date has not yet passed. If the subscription has expired (end date passed), use the renew endpoint instead. Works for both organisation users (directors) and basecamp users. This endpoint works for mobile apps.

requestBody.description: No request body required. Subscription is identified from authenticated user.

refresh.description: Indicates that the client should refresh subscription status

needs_payment.description: If true, subscription has expired and renewal payment is required

post.description: Reactivates a cancelled basecamp subscription without requiring payment. This is an alias endpoint for basecamp users. This only works if the subscription was cancelled but the end date has not yet passed. If the subscription has expired (end date passed), use the renew endpoint instead. This endpoint works for mobile apps.

requestBody.description: No request body required. Subscription is identified from authenticated user.

refresh.description: Indicates that the client should refresh subscription status

needs_payment.description: If true, subscription has expired and renewal payment is required

post.summary: Create Stripe payment intent for invoice
post.description: Creates a Stripe payment intent for paying an invoice. Requires director or super_admin role.

invoice_id.description: ID of the invoice to pay

client_secret.description: Stripe payment intent client secret for frontend

400.description: Bad request - Failed to create payment intent

403.description: Forbidden - User does not have permission

post.summary: Confirm Stripe payment after successful transaction
post.description: Confirms a Stripe payment after the payment intent has been successfully processed. Updates invoice status and activates subscription. Requires director or super_admin role.

invoice_id.description: ID of the invoice being paid

message.example: Payment processed successfully. Your subscription has been activated.

400.description: Bad request - Payment not completed or already processed

403.description: Forbidden - User does not have permission

post.description: Creates a new subscription for an organisation with the specified tier and user count. Requires director or super_admin role.

user_count.description: Number of users in the subscription

400.description: Bad request - Failed to create subscription

403.description: Forbidden

post.description: Adds a user to an existing subscription with pro-rata billing. Charges are calculated based on remaining days in the billing period. Requires director or super_admin role.

pro_rata_charge.description: Pro-rata charge amount for the remaining days

400.description: Bad request - Failed to add user

403.description: Forbidden

post.description: Removes a user from an existing subscription with pro-rata credit. Credits are calculated based on active days in the billing period. Minimum 1 user must remain. Requires director or super_admin role.

pro_rata_credit.description: Pro-rata credit amount for the active days

400.description: Bad request - Failed to remove user or minimum user count reached

403.description: Forbidden

post.description: Cancels a Stripe subscription for an organisation. Can cancel immediately or at the end of the billing period. Requires director or super_admin role. This endpoint is available for mobile apps via API.

subscription_id.description: Stripe subscription ID (stripe_subscription_id from subscription_records table)

cancel_at_period_end.description: If true (default), cancels at end of billing period. Subscription remains active until end date. If false, cancels immediately and stops all future payments.

message.example: Subscription canceled successfully. Monthly payments have been stopped.

current_period_end.description: Subscription end date - user can still use service until this date

400.description: Bad request - Failed to cancel subscription

403.description: Forbidden - User is not a director or super_admin

message.example: Only directors or super admins can cancel subscriptions.

get.description: Retrieve the authenticated user's complete profile information including personal details, organization, role, COT/SOT data, and timezone

personalityTypeDetails.example: You have not submitted your answers yet.

post.description: Update the authenticated user's profile information including name, phone, country code, timezone, and profile image

timezone.description: Valid timezone identifier (e.g., America/New_York, Europe/London, Asia/Kolkata)

profileImage.description: Profile image file (jpg, jpeg, png, max 2MB)

delete.description: Delete the authenticated user's profile photo. This will remove the photo from storage and set profile_photo_path to null.

get.description: Retrieve a list of all available timezone identifiers that can be used for user profile timezone setting

post.description: Store a new Happy Index (mood status) entry for a user

message.example: You have already submitted your response

get.summary: Get user summary by filter type
get.description: Retrieve user's Happy Index and leave summary based on filter type (this_week, last_7_days, previous_week, this_month, previous_month, custom, all)

parameters.name: start_date
parameters.description: Start date for custom filter (format: Y-m-d)

parameters.name: end_date
parameters.description: End date for custom filter (format: Y-m-d)

status.description: Present, Out of office, or Missed

bearerAuth.description: Enter JWT token in format: Bearer {token}
